extendedInfo.description: â Contacts to Text: (50,000 + Downloads)The Application is used to store contact details to text documents such as (.PDF) PDF Documents & (.Txt) Text Documents and (ADD to Email body Composer) Email the contact details & also used to send Contact details via (ADD to SMS body Composer)SMS [lot more features waiting to come]. Contact details such as  ( Contact Name ,Contact profile Image ,Phone Numbers, Email address ,Internet call, Postal  Address ,organization, Instant Message ,Notes, Nickname and websites ) are arranged in alphabetical order . By selection required Contact preview sample u can easy create your own Contact document.â CONTACT DETAILS:The following Contact details are used to create a Document.Â» 	Contact Name Â» 	Contact Profile image Â» 	Contact Phone NumberÂ» 	Email address Â» 	Internet callÂ» 	Postal Address Â» 	Organization Â» 	Instant Message Â» 	Note Â» 	Nickname Â» 	Web sites â PRINT CONTACT SETTING. The Following contacts details can set to Display/hide in the document. This document can be used for various purposes to make a list of contact name , contact phone numbers , contact address and so on this is easy and simple way to quick view of hole details in to an Document .   This document collects all the Contact details of device and used to show the details to make a particular selection from the list of contacts (with contact profile image), This contacts can be edited from the device by selected Edit Contacts in main screen.â PDF Document: (only 1 preview sample in FREE version)   The contact details are convert into an PDF Document with security key . This helps Users to print their contacts details from this PDF Document.The Application is designed in such a way that the user can Customize PDF document By various Preview samples  of PDF Document , Also use have  the Following Features â     Font Colorâ	Font Size â	Border Styleâ	Border Colorâ	Background Colorâ	Alignmentsâ	Title of the Documentâ	Subtitle â	Page numberâ	Contact Details Filterâ	Security password keyâ	Compressing PDF Documents â TEXT Document: (only 1 preview sample in FREE version) The Contact details are converted in to TEXT Document (excluding Contact profile image )  . . This helps Users to print their contacts details from this Document.â EMAIL Text:The Contact details are converted in to text (excluding Contact profile image) and added to the Email composer to send an email. This helps Users to print their contacts details from the email.SMS Text (460 Characters Only): (only 1 preview sample in FREE version) The Contact details are converted in to text (excluding Contact profile image) and added to the SMS composer to send a SMS. This helps Users to share contacts details from the SMS service.â FILE MANAGEMENT SYSTEM:The converted Document is easy arranged in this system. Contact Document is saved in the home Directory. You can able to reset any were in the SD card. Easily viewed will the respective support to view document using some Viewers software. Application also support as a File manager (Open, Delete, Rename & share).
